Author: Isaidbiiiitttttttchh
Text: My food scale helps me mentally. Without it I tend to largely over estimate calories and severely under eat.

Author: trashwitch420
Text: i love and hate my food scale, its such a double edge sword  on one hand, its anxiety reducing. like yes, this serving of peanut butter is 180 calories. this bread is 50 calories. this is, in fact an ounce of cheese. i dont panic over underestimating anymore when i eat at home. like foods like cheese, nuts, nut butters, cereals, pastas i avoided even tho i loved bc theyre hard to get an accurate serving size of i can now enjoy â„¢   on the other.... woo the obsession. i weigh almost every single thing that goes in my mouth. i get obsessed w/ how many g are in a 100 calorie serving, only weighing out half of a serving and logging it as a full one, etc.
